name: Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware输入验证错误漏洞
product: ["Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=12.2.1\uff0c<=12.2.11", "Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=12.4.1\uff0c<=12.4.11", "Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=12.6.1\uff0c<=12.6.9", "Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=12.7.1\uff0c<=12.7.6", "Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=13.2.1\uff0c<=13.2.6", "Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=12.0.1\uff0c<=12.0.14", "Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=13.4.1\uff0c<=13.4.3", "Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware 13.5.1"]
description: RTU500是日本日立制作所（Hitachi）公司的一系列工控组件，主要用于工业控制系统。Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware存在输入验证错误漏洞，该漏洞源于发送到组件的特制消息未经过正确验证，攻击者可利用漏洞导致缓冲区溢出，并最终导致RTU500 CMU重新启动。
solution:
厂商已发布补丁修复漏洞，请广大用户及时下载更新：
https://publisher.hitachienergy.com/preview?DocumentId=8DBD000184&languageCode=en&Preview=true
patch: Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware输入验证错误漏洞的补丁
